mapper.select: select u.*, ut.id as unitType$id, ut.name as unitType$name, ut.code as unitType$code, ut.description as unitType$description from sys_org_unit u, sys_org_unit_type ut where u.type_id = ut.id and u.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
